title: Sex Island, The Jersey Shore & Opiates (w/ Richie Redding & Paul Virzi)
description: We find out that "Sex Island" is back in action,  Richie Reading tells us about love on the Jersey Shore & Paul Virzi joined the show for a discussion on Roseanne Barr and how ABC wrote her character off her show.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
content:encoded: We find out that "Sex Island" is back in action,  Richie Reading tells us about love on the Jersey Shore & Paul Virzi joined the show for a discussion on Roseanne Barr and how ABC wrote her character off her show.
